text: Mary Megan "Mare" Winningham (; born May 16, 1959) is an American actress and folk-blues singer-songwriter. She was born in Phoenix, Arizona. Winningham began her acting career in 1976. She won two Emmy Awards during her career. She was also nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for the 1995 movie Georgia. For a short time in 1981, she was married to actor and singer A Martinez. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American folk singers Category:American blues singers Category:Singers from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Writers from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Mare Winningham
